attributes.action: Vets to scan microchips and owners to keep information correct.
attributes.additional_details: Currently there is no law I place for vets to check to see if a dog is microchipped  also dog owners to keep vital information up to date.
attributes.background: We live in a country of animal lovers and wish to do the most for our pets. As dog theft is on the increase, we need to do the very best to return traumatised dogs back to their owners.
